author: reshm
title: Crypto regulations in India
description: How to ensure that lawmakers and relevant agencies are sensitised about the Cardano ecosystem and its relevance for the IT economy.
solution: Sensitise the stakeholders that Cardano is safe platform, that it works with nation states and that it can create jobs in the IT sector.
experience: Loxe Inc. team, Sr. Software Engineers, Plutus Pioneers, Gimbalabs PPBL veterans, legal experts and dispute resolution specialists.
